item.title: 新日铁新总裁称协议只会加强美国钢铁业
item.description: 新日本钢铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.）新任总裁承诺将继续推进以 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.【原文：Nippon Steel Corp.’s new chief has pledged to press on with the $14.1 billion acquisition of United States Steel Corp., a deal that he says is vital to making the American company more competitive.】

item.title: 巴尔的摩船舶事故导致东海岸港口争相吞吐货物
item.description: 美国东海岸的港口正在调整作业，以吸收从巴尔的摩港分流出来的货物。在巴尔的摩港，打捞专家正在开始清理被摧毁的弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥上的残骸这一艰巨任务。【原文：Ports along the US East Coast are modifying their operations to absorb cargo diverted from Baltimore harbor, where salvage specialists are starting the daunting task of clearing debris from the destroyed Francis Scott Key Bridge.】

item.title: 银行业主管称日本面临来自美国和中国经济的风险
item.description: 日本银行业协会负责人表示，日本经济正面临着来自两个最大贸易伙伴的价格压力的风险。【原文：Japan’s economy is at risk from price pressures from its two largest trading partners, according to the chief of the country’s banking association.】

item.title: 美国石油供应商强势进入全球欧佩克+市场
item.description: 制裁俄罗斯和委内瑞拉石油的一个主要受益者是什么？美国的石油供应商，他们凭借自己的力量打入了曾经由欧佩克及其盟友主导的市场。【原文：One major beneficiary of sanctions on Russian and Venezuelan oil? US suppliers who’ve muscled their way into markets once dominated by OPEC and its allies.】

item.title: 中国售房荒持续，转机渺茫
item.description: 3 月份，中国房屋销售持续低迷，这表明人们寄予厚望的房屋销售转机仍遥遥无期。【原文：China’s home sales slump dragged on in March, signaling a much-hoped turnaround for the sector isn’t in sight yet.】

item.title: 数十亿资金涌入主动型 ETF 寻找廉价发展中股票
item.description: 随着投资者在全球范围内寻找价值被低估的股票，一个越来越受欢迎的投资目的地就是专注于新兴市场的主动管理交易所交易基金。【原文：As investors scour the globe for under-valued stocks, one increasingly popular destination is actively managed exchange-traded funds that focus on emerging markets.】

item.title: 中国工业增长是经济复苏的最新迹象
item.description: 中国的制造业活动在 3 月份出现反弹，结束了连续 5 个月的下滑，进一步证明中国的工业部门正在为经济复苏造势。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity rebounded in March, snapping a five-month decline and adding to evidence that country’s industrial sector is building momentum for an economic recovery.】

item.title: 卡塔尔在大规模液化天然气扩建前签订更多船舶合同
item.description: 卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）已签署四项协议，从亚洲船舶运营商租用 19 艘液化天然气运输船，准备提高产量。【原文：QatarEnergy has signed four agreements to charter 19 liquefied natural gas carriers from Asian ship operators as it prepares to ramp up output.】

item.title: 日本就毒素调查对小林工厂进行第二天视察
item.description: 日本厚生劳动省在周日的一份声明中说，日本当局对小林制药株式会社（Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co.【原文：Japanese authorities carried out a second day of inspections at Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co.’s factory in Wakayama prefecture over safety concerns about the drugmaker’s health supplements, the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare said in a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 顶级冰淇淋制造商待售，投资者无从选择
item.description: 内战结束时，威廉-布雷尔在费城用奶油、蔗糖和坚果手工搅拌出了第一加仑冰淇淋。他承诺使用最优质的原料，他的作品被装在一个大桶里，桶内有一个转动桨叶的手柄，然后卖给邻居。【原文：William Breyer hand-churned his first gallon of ice cream in Philadelphia at the end of the Civil War using cream, cane sugar and nuts. With the promise of the finest ingredients, his creation was cranked in a large bucket with a handle turning a paddle inside, and sold to his neighbors.】

item.title: 英加未能达成协议，贸易壁垒将增加
item.description: 允许英国免关税向加拿大销售含有欧盟部件的产品的条款将于周一到期，此前两国未能就延期问题达成协议。【原文：Provisions allowing the UK to sell products containing European Union parts to Canada tariff-free will expire on Monday, after the two countries failed to reach an agreement on extensions.】

item.title: 可可价格飙升的原因及其对巧克力爱好者的意义
item.description: 可可豆的价格在两年多的时间里持续上升，3 月份更是一飞冲天，期货合约的价格在三个月内翻了一番多，达到了之前最高纪录的两倍。可可豆价格的上涨源于西非的小农场，但也与气候变化和错综复杂的期货市场有关。最近的飙升部分是受金融动荡的推动，当大宗商品上涨过快，以至于压垮了旨在防止大宗商品价格暴跌的策略时，就会出现这种情况。【原文：A steady rise in the price of cocoa beans over two years skyrocketed in March, with futures contracts more than doubling in three months to reach a level twice as high as the previous record. It’s a progression that has its literal roots in small West African farms but also involves climate change and the intricacies of the futures market. The latest surge has been driven in part by the kind of financial turmoil that can happen when commodities rise so fast that they overwhelm strategies meant t】

item.title: 中国工厂活动六个月来首次增长
item.description: 中国 3 月份的制造业活动自 9 月份以来首次出现扩张，这表明世界第二大经济体正在企稳。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity expanded in March for the first time since September, a sign that the world’s second-largest economy is stabilizing.】

item.title: 春令变化会影响投资者对公司收益的反应 - 研究
item.description: 新的研究表明，春季时钟的变化极大地影响了投资者对披露意外收益水平的公司的反应。【原文：The spring clock change significantly affects how investors respond to companies that reveal unexpected levels of earnings, new research shows.】

item.title: 驳船撞桥后俄克拉荷马州警察疏导交通
item.description: 俄克拉荷马州萨利索市（美联社）— 俄克拉荷马州巡警局周六表示，在一艘驳船撞上阿肯色河上的一座桥梁后，该局关闭了萨利索市南部的一条高速公路。【原文：SALLISAW, Okla. (AP) — The Oklahoma State Patrol said Saturday that it closed a highway south of Sallisaw after a barge struck a bridge over Arkansas River.】

item.title: 美国就业人数有望连续第四个月达到至少 20 万人
item.description: 美国 3 月份继续保持健康的就业增长，同时工资增长放缓，这表明美国劳动力市场有望继续刺激经济，通胀回升的风险有限。【原文：Healthy US employment gains continued in March while wage growth moderated, indicating the nation’s labor market is poised to keep stoking the economy with limited risk of an inflation resurgence.】

item.title: 南苏丹打击平行外汇市场以抗击通货膨胀
item.description: 南苏丹打击了首都朱巴的外汇交易商，该国最高央行行长称此举是稳定迅速贬值的货币的努力的一部分。【原文：South Sudan has cracked down on forex dealers in the capital, Juba, in a move the country’s top central banker said was part of an effort to stabilize its rapidly depreciating currency.】

item.title: CLO 管理者担心 Altice 降级会引发最高风险债券的抛售
item.description: 法国 Altice 公司威胁对债权人进行减免的决定所带来的影响才刚刚开始。【原文：The fallout from Altice France’s decision to threaten a haircut for creditors is just beginning.】

item.title: 加密社交媒体公司 Merkle 在 Paradigm 交易中获得独角兽估值
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由 Coinbase Global Inc. 两位前高管创立的去中心化社交媒体网络软件开发商即将完成一轮融资，估值约为 10 亿美元。【原文：A developer of software for decentralized social-media networks founded by two former Coinbase Global Inc. executives is close to completing a funding round valuing it at about $1 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Cerberus 考虑扩大与 Intrum 的合作，以解决公司债务问题
item.description: Cerberus 资本管理公司（Cerberus Capital Management LP）和 Intrum AB 正在考虑建立更广泛的合作关系，因为这家瑞典讨债公司正在探索解决借款问题的方案。【原文：Cerberus Capital Management LP and Intrum AB are considering a more extensive partnership as the Swedish debt collector explores options to address its borrowings.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯称 2024 年可能降息四次：Proto Thema
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，2024 年总共降息四次是可行的，到年底将降息 100 个基点。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras said a total of four interest rate cuts is feasible in 2024, for a reduction of 100 basis points by year-end.】

item.title: 赌房地产价格上涨，伦敦写字楼销售被搁置
item.description: 伦敦写字楼市场的投资者一直迫切希望看到市场好转的迹象。推出两笔大幅打折的交易，押注价格回升的举措或许能提供这些迹象。【原文：Investors in London’s office market have been desperately hoping for signs of improvement. Moves to pull two heavily discounted deals to bet on a price recovery may provide them.】

item.title: 拉里-芬克的致辞我们需要拥抱我们的资本主义
item.description:
他说，人的寿命越来越长，但我们却没有讨论如何支付退休费用

。【原文：

Lifespans are getting longer, he says, but we’re failing to discuss paying for retirement

】

item.title: 泽连斯基不顾美国反对誓言对俄罗斯发动更多无人机袭击
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）表示，尽管美国对乌克兰的行动不满，但乌克兰将继续使用国产无人机打击俄罗斯的炼油设施。【原文：Ukraine will keep targeting Russian oil-refining facilities with domestically-made drones despite US discontent with its campaign, according to President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.】

item.title: 交易所交易的外汇衍生品可能受到印度央行新法规的冲击
item.description: 据说印度央行已经确认，与卢比挂钩的交易所交易货币衍生品合约只能以套期保值为目的，而此前曾出现过允许 1 亿美元以下头寸进行非套期保值交易的混乱局面。【原文：India’s central bank is said to have confirmed that exchange-traded currency derivative contracts linked to the rupee can only be offered for hedging purposes after confusion that unhedged trades were allowed for positions below $100 million.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注欧洲，寻找股市反弹的下一站
item.description: 投资者押注欧洲将推动全球股市的下一轮反弹，扩大了他们的投资范围，因为更加昂贵的美国市场唤起了人们对网络泡沫的回忆。【原文：Investors are betting that Europe will drive the next leg of the global equity rally, broadening their playbooks as a more expensive US market evokes memories of the dot-com bubble.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长霍尔茨曼不会寻求连任奥地利银行行长
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，当他的任期于 2025 年 8 月结束时，他不会寻求连任奥地利国家银行行长。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Robert Holzmann said he won’t seek a second term as head of the Austrian National Bank when his stint ends in August 2025.】

item.title: 产品召回后日本检查小林制药公司的工厂
item.description: 日本当局检查了小林制药株式会社位于大阪的工厂，此前这家制药商召回了一些与死亡和住院有关的保健品。【原文：Japanese authorities inspected Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co.’s factory in Osaka after the drugmaker recalled some health supplements that have been linked to deaths and hospitalizations.】

item.title: 英国期待《尖峰时刻》重振工业荒地
item.description: 汤米-谢尔比（Tommy Shelby）是英国电视剧《尖峰时刻》（Peaky Blinders）的主人公，因在 20 世纪 20 年代的伯明翰管理无法无天的贫民区而闻名。【原文：Tommy Shelby, the protagonist of British TV series Peaky Blinders, is known for running lawless slum neighborhoods in 1920s Birmingham.】

item.title: 万达以 83 亿美元出让其购物中心业务控制权
item.description: 大连万达同意出让其购物中心部门的控制权，交易价值 600 亿元人民币（83 亿美元）。【原文：Dalian Wanda agreed to cede control of its shopping mall unit in a deal worth 60 billion yuan ($8.3 billion).】
